course_description: Only open to Film and Media Management Concentration students. Learn from industry professionals to obtain critical perspectives and practical experience in  generating content. Students will collaborate on a capstone project that will be presented to academic and industry stakeholders.
prerequisites: FILM 301 or FILM 301W or FILM 302 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
